video_prompt: Pink petals float and scatter across a curving wooden path. Lush foliage sways behind rocks as flower clusters gently sway overhead. The pathway recedes, blurring into a mist-shrouded green landscape.
image_prompt: Generate an enchanting, full-length vertical shot of a walkway adorned with vibrant pink flowers. A light brown wooden plank path, curving gently right, leads into the background. A light brown wooden fence parallels the right side, while large grey rocks and lush green foliage line the left. A natural archway of blooming pink flowers creates a canopy overhead, with some blossoms closer and slightly out of focus. Small, bright pink flower petals are strewn across the path. In the blurred background, concentrated pink petals hint at an abundance of flowers, with glimpses of a misty green landscape and soft white sky. The overall impression is serene beauty with joyful pink accents.
refined_video_prompt: Pink petals float and scatter across the surface. Lush foliage sways, and flower clusters gently sway overhead. The pathway recedes, blurring into a mist-shrouded landscape where green hues softly emerge through shifting mist.
